thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Brimstone Says Disposed 13.5 Mln Shares In Life Healthcare For 362 Mln Rand

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brimstone Says Disposed 13.5 Mln Shares In Life Healthcare For 362 Mln Rand
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Brimstone Investment Corporation Ltd :
* ANNOUNCEMENT REGARDING THE DISPOSAL OF 13.5 MLN LIFE HEALTHCARE GROUP HOLDINGS LIMITED SHARES
* DISPOSAL ‍FOR AN AGGREGATE TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF R362 MILLION
* BRIMSTONE INVESTMENT CORPORATION - ‍FOLLOWING DISPOSAL BRIMSTONE HOLDS 51.3 MLN SHARES IN LIFE HEALTHCARE, REPRESENTING SHAREHOLDING OF 3.54 PCT​
* ‍TOTAL CONSIDERATION RECEIVED BY BRIMSTONE FOR DISPOSAL WILL BE USED TO REPAY CERTAIN OUTSTANDING DEBT FUNDING OBLIGATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
